activities: Inreach Solutions provides CRM solutions to human services organizations. Inreach Solution's client organizations store various personal information about their clients and human resources information about their employees on our servers in the US. Inreach Solutions does not own or control the data stored by its client organizations and may only access their data for support or troubleshooting purposes at our clients request. Inreach Solutions also stores basic information on our client organizations, such as their contact info and corporate officers.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
